Title: Lice Things Are Lice
Writer: Gregory Thompson, Mike Benner (story editor), Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: When Tina volunteers alongside Nurse Liz, she finds herself involved in the biggest scandal to hit Wagstaff: a lice infestation. Meanwhile, Bob makes improvements to the restaurant that end...
